short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Display JSON objects by transforming them into Syntax editable highlighted HTML to validate, format, and save
short.de: Anzeige von JSON-Objekten durch Umwandlung in in Syntax editierbares, hervorgehobenes HTML
short.es: Mostrar los objetos JSON transformándolos en HTML resaltado y editable por sintaxis para validarlos, formatearlos y guardarlos.
short.fr: Afficher les objets JSON en les transformant en HTML surligné modifiable par la syntaxe
short.it: Visualizzare gli oggetti JSON trasformandoli in HTML evidenziati con sintassi modificabile per convalidarli, formattarli e salvarli
short.ja: JSON オブジェクトを Syntax 編集可能なハイライトされた HTML に変換して表示し、検証、フォーマット、保存を行います。
short.nl: Geef JSON-objecten weer door ze om te zetten in Syntax bewerkbare gemarkeerde HTML om ze te valideren, te formatteren en op te slaan
short.pl: Wyświetlanie obiektów JSON poprzez przekształcenie ich w podświetlany HTML z możliwością edycji składni.
short.pt_BR: Exibir objetos JSON transformando-os em Sintaxe HTML destacado editável para validar, formatar e salvá-los
short.pt_PT: Mostrar objectos JSON transformando-os em HTML sintáctico editável realçado para validar, formatar e guardar
short.ru: Отображение JSON объектов путем преобразования их в редактируемый синтаксисом выделенный HTML
short.zh_CN: 通过将JSON对象转换为Syntax可编辑的高亮HTML来显示JSON对象，以验证、格式化和保存它们。

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
🚀 Elevate your JSON browsing experience with our Chrome extension – your ultimate tool for JSON formatting and beautifying! With lightning-fast performance, even on lengthy JSON pages, our extension ensures readability is never compromised. Seamlessly toggle between raw and parsed JSON with just a click, and revel in the added convenience of collapsible trees, syntax highlighting, and clickable URLs. Plus, indulge in the option of a sleek dark mode for enhanced viewing pleasure. Whether you're a developer or enthusiast, our extension transforms JSON into an easily digestible format, making browsing a breeze. Compatible with any valid JSON page, regardless of the URL, and boasting negligible performance impact on non-JSON pages, it's the must-have addition to your Chrome arsenal. Experience JSON like never before – download now! 🌟

FAQ:
Q: How does the extension work?
A: Our extension automatically formats JSON whenever it detects it on a browser tab, ensuring readability and ease of use.

Q: Does the extension support dark mode?
A: Absolutely! We offer an optional dark mode feature for those who prefer a sleeker viewing experience.

Q: Is there a performance impact on non-JSON pages?
A: Not at all! Our extension has a negligible performance impact on non-JSON pages, ensuring smooth browsing.

Q: Can I toggle between raw and parsed JSON?
A: Yes, with just a click of a button, you can seamlessly switch between raw and parsed JSON for your convenience.

Q: What if I encounter issues with other browser extensions?
A: If our extension clashes with another extension, try disabling conflicting ones. If you need further assistance, reach out to us, and we'll find a solution.

More Features:
Syntax Highlighting: Easily distinguish different elements of your JSON with syntax highlighting, making it simpler to understand and navigate.

Collapsible Trees with Indent Guides: Dive deeper into complex JSON structures with collapsible trees and helpful indent guides, ensuring you never lose track of where you are.

Clickable URLs: Instantly access linked URLs within your JSON data with clickable hyperlinks, streamlining your browsing experience.

Fast Performance: Enjoy lightning-fast performance, even on very long JSON pages, ensuring you can browse with speed and efficiency.

Open Source: Our extension is open source, meaning you can contribute to its development and ensure its continued improvement for the community. Join us in making JSON browsing better for everyone!

Customization Options: Tailor your JSON viewing experience to your preferences with customizable settings, including themes, font sizes, and more. Make it your own!

Developer Friendly: Built with developers in mind, our extension provides the tools you need to work with JSON efficiently, saving you time and effort in your coding tasks.
